text: @atiku Useless appeal! After you spent 8 years as VP and another 8 years your PDP ruled a s ruined couple with the current 6 yrs the person GMB ypu helped to power, now you are appealing for someone to donate his centre for covid19? Did you not know a day like this will sure come?
